writer.name: 阿丽娜·格里高尔 Alina Grigore

director.name: 阿丽娜·格里高尔 Alina Grigore

introduction: The screenplay, written by Grigore, centres on the difficult relationship between a father, Rudi, and his daughter, Lola, a young actress with a bohemian lifestyle, whose wildly different personalities often put them in conflict with one another. As Rudi thinks Lola’s life choices are increasingly dubious, he unexpectedly shows up at the family’s summer house in the Danube Delta, determined to find solutions to brighten his daughter’s future.
